Posts.Content: Yes it does go away. My head was so sore prior to my hair falling out, but just as soon as I buzzed it the soreness went away. Deb
Posts.Title: Does head soreness go away after hair comes out?? (hopefully??)

Posts.Content: Im having the same problem, seems like my left eye is always watering or wake up with it crusted. Also, my nose had ran since I started chemo. Onc suggested Claritin, but hasnt helped. Deb

Posts.Title: age when diagnosed?

Posts.Content: Yes I think women should have a mammogram done much earlier than 40. Im 39 and found a lump 2 days after my annual exam. I was huge I dont see how they missed it. No family history of breast CA. I have a daughter who is 20, her insurance will pay for her to have a mammo now that I have a dx of breast CA. Your right some PCP will not order a mammo before 40. Thats an idea for women, say they felt something or complain of breast pain. Deb
Posts.Title: Mammogram for the under 40

Posts.Content: Been waiting for a post from you. Glad you are doing better. I pray that you continue to get stronger and ditch the walker. Deb
Posts.Title: Hello pink warriors :)

Posts.Content: Ive read many posts here by women who have a mastectomy then undergo their chemo/radiation or both. What determines to remove then treat or to treat then remove. Ive just began chemo, my onc says mastectomy will come after I finish chemo. My lump is very large (PET scan says 10cm)with liver mets. I fear that what if the chemo doesnt work and cancer also spreads to my lungs, ribs. Thanks for your input. Prayers to all. Deb
